question.title: Minimum Split Into Subarrays With GCD Greater Than One
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Minimum Subarrays in a Valid Split", "titleSlug": "minimum-subarrays-in-a-valid-split", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: How does the GCD of an array change when you add more elements to a subarray?
The GCD will always decrease when increasing the size of the subarray,
Keep adding elements to a subarray and if adding a new element will make the GCD = 1, add a new split and a new subarray.
